name: Edmund Husserl
education: Leipzig University, (1876–78), Humboldt University of Berlin
main_interests: Epistemology, ontology, philosophy of mathematics, intersubjectivity
thesis1_title: Beiträge zur Variationsrechnung (Contributions to the Calculus of Variations)
thesis2_title: Über den Begriff der Zahl (On the Concept of Number)
doctoral_advisor: Leo Königsberger (PhD advisor), Carl Stumpf (Dr. phil. hab. advisor)
